homepage.title: Oiltarator | Oil trading company
homepage.description: Trading company operating extensively in the technical vegetable oil trade industry in Ostrava.

Homepage.slogan: Your best choice for technical oils!
Homepage.oilSectionTitle: In the offer of our technical oils, you can find a wide range of types and qualities, from pure vegetable oils:
Homepage.oilDescription: to oils with increased acidity, and mixtures of vegetable oils prepared especially at the customer's request, under specific parameters.
Homepage.companyDescription: OilTarator s.r.o. has modern technical facilities with a storage capacity of up to 1,300 tons. Our base is located in Ostrava, approx. 20 km to the Polish border, close to the motorway exit, which makes organizing transport much easier. As a company, we also provide goods storage and reloading services.
Homepage.greeting: We invite you to cooperate. We will be happy to answer all your questions.

Banner.title: Better Prices for You!
Banner.description: We've opened a new branch closer to you! This allows us to deliver faster and lower the prices of our oils. Take advantage of our great offers and enjoy even more convenient shopping!

Contact.heading: Where can you find us?
Contact.mapDescription: Our branches are available to you at several locations. Please contact us in advance by phone or email to arrange a meeting or get details about our products and services. We look forward to your visit!
Contact.contactDescription: If you are interested in any of our services or have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to answer all your questions.
